markets.title: Will the USD price for 1 Ether be above 180.00 USD on the 30th of October 2019 at UTC 12:00?

outcomes.title: No
outcomes.when: Price below or equal to 180.00 USD

markets.title: Will the fees earned by miners on the Ethereum blockchain for the preceding 24 hours be greater than 510 ETH on October the 30th 2019 at UTC 00:00:00?

outcomes.title: Yes
outcomes.when: The fees are greater than 510 ETH

outcomes.title: No
outcomes.when: The fees are equal or less than 510 ETH
